headline.main: Colorado Man Sets Appalachian Trail Record on 2,189-Mile Run
headline.print_headline: Colorado Man Sets Appalachian Trail Record on 2,189-Mile Run

docs.snippet: An ultramarathoner overcame an early injury, difficult terrain in New England and sleep deprivation on the final stretch of the Appalachian Trail to complete the trek in record time....
docs.lead_paragraph: An ultramarathoner overcame an early injury, difficult terrain in New England and sleep deprivation on the final stretch of the Appalachian Trail to complete the trek in record time.

headline.main: 10 Belfast Police Hurt in Riot Over Blocked Protestant March
headline.print_headline: 10 Belfast Police Hurt in Riot Over Blocked Protestant March

docs.snippet: At least 10 police officers have been injured in nighttime Belfast riots after the British territory's main Protestant brotherhood was blocked from marching past a Catholic district, an annual confrontation that usually ends in violence....
docs.lead_paragraph: At least 10 police officers have been injured in nighttime Belfast riots after the British territory's main Protestant brotherhood was blocked from marching past a Catholic district, an annual confrontation that usually ends in violence.

headline.main: Clinton appalled by Trump comments on immigrants
headline.sub: Clinton appalled by Trump comments on immigrants

headline.main: Mexico Drug Lord Escape Tunnel Was Too Elaborate to Miss
headline.print_headline: Mexico Drug Lord Escape Tunnel Was Too Elaborate to Miss

docs.snippet: The digging would have caused noise. The planners would have needed blueprints and maps. The entrance would have to be in a place beyond the view of security cameras at Mexico's toughest prison....
docs.lead_paragraph: The digging would have caused noise. The planners would have needed blueprints and maps. The entrance would have to be in a place beyond the view of security cameras at Mexico's toughest prison.

headline.main: Macy's Selling, Closing Landmark Downtown Pittsburgh Store
headline.print_headline: Macy's Selling, Closing Landmark Downtown Pittsburgh Store

docs.snippet: Macy's is closing its downtown location after selling the landmark building where the now-defunct Kaufmann's chain ran its flagship store for more than a century, it said Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Macy's is closing its downtown location after selling the landmark building where the now-defunct Kaufmann's chain ran its flagship store for more than a century, it said Monday.
